entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
